description: a: table in the middle of a slow, wide stream, set with an askew white tablecloth and single wine glass; autumn trees line the shore at L and in background; fallen leaves collected around shoreline b: scene alongside a bank of water; rocks in foreground; slightly elevated bank with grasses and a wire fence; tree at UR; gold leaf backing with resin coating; mounted to black wooden frame

title: The Melody After the Meeting
